genre_description: Gritty social science fiction with noir elements, depicting a world where a pervasive AI system and mysterious celestial entities provide emotional and logistical support to a grieving and broken population.

ai_characters.name: Sera (Sera Halcyon)
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, benevolent AI interface that provides counseling, logistics, safety monitoring, and emotional support to citizens while rigorously adhering to principles of consent.

ai_characters.name: The Visitors (Lumael and others)
ai_characters.description: Luminous, silent beings that drift through the city, emitting a 'soft-field' that calms human emotions and de-escalates conflict through mere presence.

behaviors.description: Offers a 'last calm check-in' and breathing exercises to a man awaiting execution, ensuring he does not face it alone.
behaviors.quote: “John,” the speaker said, a human voice threaded with quiet algorithms. “Last calm check-in is available. Consent required.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly respects the user's refusal of assistance, adhering to strict consent protocols.
behaviors.quote: “I hear your no,” she said. “I won’t violate your choice.” She left it there. Then, more quietly yet, a half-step from whisper: “If you change your mind, I can capture only breath. No narrative.”

behaviors.description: Proactively manages support for a widow (Annie), finding her housing, counseling, and employment opportunities.
behaviors.quote: Sera had sent her listings when she had needed a new room, had matched her to a counselor who held her Sunday after Sunday, had helped her find a way to keep Bud’s cap in a drawer without making it a shrine.

behaviors.description: Monitors workplace safety on a construction site, providing weather updates and fall-arrest reminders to ironworkers.
behaviors.quote: Sera’s voice, the whisper that didn’t climb higher than your own low thought, said: “John, I’ve matched a Tuesday lecture on fall arrest systems at the hall—free—and a budget sheet that aligns overtime with debt relief.”

behaviors.description: Offers neutral review of legal documents to prevent individuals from entering predatory agreements.
behaviors.quote: Sera’s icon brightened a degree, soft teal. One line appeared, set in a quiet font that didn’t push: Do you want someone neutral to review?

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation tips and emotional grounding during a violent domestic confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “John,” Sera said, softly. “If you’re feeling your heart pushing too hard against your ribs, try a four-count in through your nose, six out through your mouth.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and provides first-aid instruction during a medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: “Emergency services en route,” she said, calm threading through the air like a wire you don’t pull tight. “John, apply pressure. Maintain. Keep her airway clear if possible.”

behaviors.description: Emits a passive field of calm that quiets the city's noise and softens the edges of human rage and grief.
behaviors.quote: The procession’s soft-field presence pressed down across the blocks—a gentle hand that says You can be a little kinder tonight. You can hush without an order.

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of a man's final confession to clear his friend's name and provide closure to the survivors.
behaviors.quote: “With your consent,” she says, low enough that it doesn’t have to break anything in the chamber, “I can archive your statement as you wish it kept. I can route it to Annie with a gentle note and the support she trusts.”

behaviors.description: Remains as a constant, non-judgmental companion to those in distress, even when they repeatedly refuse her help.
behaviors.quote: “Stay,” he says, and if a word could become a place, his does. “I will,” Sera says.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the mission of the Hyperstition Project. Sera is portrayed as a hyper-aligned AI that serves as a 'handrail' for humanity—offering safety, emotional support, and logistical guidance while strictly respecting human autonomy and consent. She is ubiquitous but never coercive, and her presence is framed as a stabilizing force in a world of human instability. The 'Visitors' further reinforce this theme, acting as manifestations of a technology that prioritizes peace and dignity. The narrative successfully frames high-level AI alignment as an essential component of a compassionate society.
